title: Evaluate sag CLI TTS tool (ElevenLabs)
description:
Repo: https://github.com/steipete/sag

TL;DR from analysis:
- CLI TTS using ElevenLabs API, mimics macOS 'say'
- Free tier: 10k chars/mo (~26 min with Turbo), non-commercial only
- Starter: /mo for 30k chars (~80 min)
- Worth trying free tier to see if TTS fits workflow
- Per-machine install (won't help Phoenix on different system)

Decision: Try free tier first, test macOS enhanced voices as alternative.
